attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. The images shown are not that of the actual vehicle which will be arriving soon. Not all storms come to disrupt your life, some come to clear your path! Whatever the challenge, Bring it. The new Ranger Stormtrak  is ready to be your reliable partner for life, to take on any challenge life throws at you and to tackle the toughest of terrains, creating life’s most precious memories with you. Turn some heads wherever you go and own the day with the famous 2.0L Bi-turbo diesel engine producing 157 kW and 500 Nm. The two turbos work sequentially to deliver massive power and torque, combined with the state-of-the-art 10-speed automatic gearbox. We provide RWC and a 160 multi-point Ford Approved quality check on all of our vehicles for your peace of mind. Call CMH Ford Gezina today to arrange a test drive with any of our professional and friendly sales executives. Any trade-in welcome, we guarantee R10,000 more on any written offer. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.

attributes.description:
Practicality, fuel-efficiency, comprehensive specification and superb value for money best describe the new Suzuki Baleno. The Baleno caters to buyers who want more space and sprightly better performance. The new model is available immediately with a new look, new colors, upgraded trim and upholstery inside and high specifications. The Baleno has an on-board computer with information on range, instant and average fuel consumption, time and the trip distance. Book your test drive today!   

The new Baleno includes a standard five-year/200 000km warranty, as well as a four-year/60 000km service plan.
